text: Sunflower butter, also called sunflower seed butter, is a nut butter like spread made from sunflower seeds. It is commonly used as an alternative for people with nut allergies. It has a mild flavor if other flavors like salt and sugar aren't added to it. In 2011, brands of sunflower butter had came to most retail stores. == References == Category:Nut butters
title: Sunflower butter
